      [openssl] crt → pfx

      December 6, 2023 less than 1 minute read

      openssl pkcs12 -export -certpbe PBE-SHA1-3DES -keypbe PBE-SHA1-3DES -nomac -inkey contoso.com.key -in contoso.com.crt -out contoso.com-legacy.pfx
